text: Cressa is a genus of amphipod crustaceans in the family Creesidae, with species living in depths from 31 to 820 meters. == Species == These species were placed by the World Register of Marine Species. * Cressa abyssicola G. O. Sars, 1879 * Cressa bereskini Gurjanova, 1936 * Cressa carinata Stephensen, 1931 * Cressa cristata Myers, 1969 * Cressa dubia Spence Bate, 1857 * Cressa jeanjusti Krapp-Schickel, 2005 * Cressa mediterranea Ruffo, 1979 * Cressa minuta Boeck, 1871 * Cressa quinquedentata Stephensen, 1931 == References == Category:Crustacean genera
title: Cressa (crustacean)
